overview: Malena, Pablo and Tomas are a life friends: since they where in kindergarten until they finished high school a couple years ago. They have a rock band. At night they will play in a party. From the beginning of the show to the moment they go away, almost at next day noon, the feelings of Tomas go on a rollercoaster between the love and friendship, jealousy and ears.
title: The Space Between Us
